org.efaps.init

Class StartupDatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.init.StartupDatabaseConnection

    public final class StartupDatabaseConnection
extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • startup

        public static void startup()
                    throws StartupException
        Startups the eFaps kernel with the bootstrap configuration defined as shell variable. If the bootstrap configuration is not defined as shell variables, the default bootstrap definition is used.
        Throws:
        StartupException - if startup failed
        See Also:
        startup(String, String)

      • startup

        public static void startup(String _bootstrapFile)
                    throws StartupException
        Startups the eFaps kernel with the bootstrap path defined as shell variable (or if not defined the default bootstrap path is used).
        Parameters:
        _bootstrapFile - name of the bootstrap file (without file extension); null means the the name of the bootstrap is not predefined
        Throws:
        StartupException - if startup failed
        See Also:
        startup(String, String)

      • startup

        public static void startup(String _bootstrapPath,
           String _bootstrapFile)
                    throws StartupException

        Startups he kernel depending on a bootstrap definition.

        Following rules applies for the bootstrap path:

        • if _bootstrapPath is not null, _bootstrapPath is used as bootstrap path
        • if in the system environment the shell variable ENV_PATH is defined, this value of this shell variable is used
        • in all other cases DEFAULT_BOOTSTRAP_PATH is used

        Following rules applies for the bootstrap name:

        • if _bootstrapFile is not null, _bootstrapFile is used as bootstrap name
        • if in the system environment the shell variable ENV_FILE is defined, this value of this shell variable is used
        • in all other cases DEFAULT_BOOTSTRAP_FILE is used

        After the used bootstrap file is identified, this file is opened and the keys are read and evaluated.

        Parameters:
        _bootstrapPath - path where the bootstrap files are located; null means that the path is not predefined
        _bootstrapFile - name of the bootstrap file (without file extension); null means the the name of the bootstrap is not predefined
        Throws:
        StartupException - if startup failed

      • startup

        public static void startup(String _classDBType,
           String _classDSFactory,
           String _propConnection,
           String _classTM,
           String _classTSR,
           String _eFapsProps)
                    throws StartupException
        Initialize the database information set for given parameter values.
        Parameters:
        _classDBType - class name of the database type
        _classDSFactory - class name of the SQL data source factory
        _propConnection - string with properties for the JDBC connection
        _classTM - class name of the transaction manager
        _classTSR - class name of TransactionSynchronizationRegistry
        _eFapsProps - tring with properties
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the database connection or transaction manager could not be initialized
        See Also:
        StartupDatabaseConnection#startup(String, String, Map, String, Integer), convertToMap(String)

      • startup

        public static void startup(String _classDBType,
           String _classDSFactory,
           String _propConnection,
           String _classTM,
           String _classTSR,
           Map<String,String> _eFapsProps)
                    throws StartupException
        Initialize the database information set for given parameter values.
        Parameters:
        _classDBType - class name of the database type
        _classDSFactory - class name of the SQL data source factory
        _propConnection - string with properties for the JDBC connection
        _classTM - class name of the transaction manager
        _classTSR - class name of TransactionSynchronizationRegistry
        _eFapsProps - Map or properties
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the database connection or transaction manager could not be initialized
        See Also:
        StartupDatabaseConnection#startup(String, String, Map, String, Integer), convertToMap(String)

      • startup

        public static void startup(String _classDBType,
           String _classDSFactory,
           Map<String,String> _propConnection,
           String _classTM,
           String _classTSR,
           Map<String,String> _eFapsProps)
                    throws StartupException
        Initialize the database information set for given parameter values.
        • configure the database type
        • initialize the SQL data source (JDBC connection to the database)
        • initialize transaction manager
        Parameters:
        _classDBType - class name of the database type
        _classDSFactory - class name of the SQL data source factory
        _propConnection - map of properties for the JDBC connection
        _classTM - class name of the transaction manager
        _classTSR - class name of TransactionSynchronizationRegistry
        _eFapsProps - Map or properties
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the database connection or transaction manager could not be initialized
        See Also:
        configureDBType(Context, String), configureDataSource(Context, String, Map), #configureTransactionManager(Context, String, Integer)

                            Map<String,String> _eFapsProps)
                                        throws StartupException
        Add the eFaps Properties to the JNDI binding.
        Parameters:
        _compCtx - Java root naming context
        _eFapsProps - Properties to bind
        Throws:
        StartupException - on error

      • configureDataSource

        protected static void configureDataSource(Context _compCtx,
                       String _classDSFactory,
                       Map<String,String> _propConnection)
                                   throws StartupException
        The class defined with parameter _classDSFactory initialized and bind to INamingBinds.RESOURCE_DATASOURCE. The initialized class must implement interface DataSource. As JDBC connection properties the map _propConneciton is used.
        Parameters:
        _compCtx - Java root naming context
        _classDSFactory - class name of the SQL data source factory
        _propConnection - map of properties for the JDBC connection
        Throws:
        StartupException - on error

      • configureDBType

        protected static void configureDBType(Context _compCtx,
                   String _classDBType)
                               throws StartupException
        The class defined with parameter _classDBType initialized and bind to INamingBinds.RESOURCE_DBTYPE. The initialized class must be extended from class AbstractDatabase.
        Parameters:
        _compCtx - Java root naming context
        _classDBType - class name of the database type
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the database type class could not be found, initialized, accessed or bind to the context

      • configureTransactionManager

        protected static void configureTransactionManager(Context _compCtx,
                               String _classTM)
                                           throws StartupException
        The class defined with parameter _classTM initialized and bind to INamingBinds.RESOURCE_TRANSMANAG. The initialized class must implement interface TransactionManager.
        Parameters:
        _compCtx - Java root naming context
        _classTM - class name of the transaction manager
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the transaction manager class could not be found, initialized, accessed or bind to the context

                                               String _classTSR)
                                                           throws StartupException

        _compCtx - Java root naming context
        _classTSR - class name of the transaction SynchronizationRegistry
        Throws:
        StartupException - if the transaction manager class could not be found, initialized, accessed or bind to the context

      • convertToMap

        public static Map<String,String> convertToMap(String _text)

        Separates all key / value pairs of given text string.

        Evaluation algorithm:
        Separates the text by all found commas (only if in front of the comma is no back slash). This are the key / value pairs. A key / value pair is separated by the first equal ('=') sign.

        Parameters:
        _text - text string to convert to a key / value map
        Returns:
        Map of strings with all found key / value pairs

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
                     throws StartupException
        Shutdowns the connection to the database.
        Throws:
        StartupException - if shutdown failed
